about_the_game:
Purchase the cinematic and emotional soundtrack to Manifest 99, a VR experience by Flight School Studio. Composed by Barrett Lewis. This soundtrack DLC contains MP3 files of the following:

01: The Afterlife
02: Main Theme
03: Riding The Train
04: The Bear
04: The Doe
06: The Owl
07: Stealing and the Crash
08: Redemption and Credits

© Copyright - Barrett Lewis / Barrett Lewis
detailed_description:
Purchase the cinematic and emotional soundtrack to Manifest 99, a VR experience by Flight School Studio. Composed by Barrett Lewis. This soundtrack DLC contains MP3 files of the following:

01: The Afterlife
02: Main Theme
03: Riding The Train
04: The Bear

package_groups.title: Buy Manifest 99 Soundtrack by Barrett Lewis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • Sound Card: Any sound card capable of stereo output
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4 / DisplayPort 1.2

reviews:
“Añadimos también a este sobresaliente conjunto artístico, un excelente uso de la música (más que del sonido) obra de Barret Lewis, aproximándose a tonalidades muy cinematográficas y proveyendo al conjunto de una conceptualización superior.”
RealoVirtual

“While the bear man, the deer lady and the owl granny don’t talk, there’s plenty of music to help set the mood. It’s actually really well done and, without sounding like a pretentious twat, it really does give the whole tale a voice.”
Pure PlayStation
short_description: Purchase the cinematic and emotional soundtrack to Manifest 99, a VR experience by Flight School Studio.
